column1: The Purple Pig////Roasted Bone Marrow- This dish was my favorite dish of the night. It came with herbs
column2: capers and onions with a side of Maldonado sea salt. You spread the bone marrow on the toast
column3: grab some of the salt and sprinkle it on top
column4: and then you top it off with the greens. A perfect bite every time. I would order this dish again and again.
